texts.value: Interconverts simultaneously and stereospecifically pyruvate and lactate with concomitant interconversion of NADH and NAD(+)
Fermentation of pyruvate to lactate is inhibited when bound to folliculin FLCN, perhaps partly by FLCN preventing binding of cofactor NADH (PubMed:34381247)
Fermentation; pyruvate fermentation to lactate; (S)-lactate from pyruvate: step 1/1

Homotetramer (PubMed:11276087). Interacts with PTEN upstream reading frame protein MP31 (PubMed:33406399). Interacts with folliculin FLCN; the interaction is direct and inhibits enzymatic activity (PubMed:34381247)
Predominantly expressed in anaerobic tissues such as skeletal muscle and liver

disease.description: A metabolic disorder that results in exertional myoglobinuria, pain, cramps and easy fatigue.

texts.value: The disease is caused by variants affecting the gene represented in this entry
Belongs to the LDH/MDH superfamily. LDH family

comments.note: Another dark horse - Issue 109 of September 2009
